ygData.subject: RE: Song Taunting.
ygData.msgSnippet: can t explain the cleric, but Lucan is like a 3000 point faction hit, so most people go straight to scowls.  i know i did after my first kill.  a dozen or so
ygData.messageBody:
can't explain the cleric, but Lucan is like a 3000 point faction hit, so
most people go straight to scowls. i know i did after my first kill. a
dozen or so Lucans later, i don't even think i get a faction hit as i am
bottomed out. when the dwarven ale quest was still in, i think it took
about 2000 ale to get back to dubious.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> My
> group, got the
> experience which was a shock, but even more shocking, I went from
> indifferent to scowls even in wolf form!! ARGH! The cleric
> in my group who
> was dubious before the fight also got the faction hit for
> both kills and is
> still dubious, WTF?!?
